description: Are you looking to encrypt your data within PostgreSQL? We will review the various options available for encrypting data with PostgreSQL. We will also look at various options available to employ encryption and review various configuration and performance for using encryption.

title: Syed Faisal Akber: A comparison of PostgreSQL Encryption Options
